citation: Proclamation under the TasTAFE (Skills and Training Business) Act 2021 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the TasTAFE (Skills and Training Business) Act 2021

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the TasTAFE (Skills and Training Business) Act 2021 fix 1 July 2022 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

30 May 2022

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

R. C. JAENSCH

Minister for Skills, Training and Workforce Growth

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 8 June 2022

This proclamation is administered in the Department of State Growth.
